level.text: 8305.1 Surrender of a newborn pursuant to the Act shall constitute aelinquishment of the parental rights of the surrendering parent.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8599October 30, 2009)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposedulemaking published at 57 DCR 5967 (July 9, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended byotice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11742 (December0, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR052, 8056 (September 16, 2011).
